marilib.airplane.propulsion.turbofan.turbofan_data module¶

Created on Thu Jan 24 23:22:21 2019

@author: DRUOT Thierryoriginal Scilab implementation

PETEILH Nicolas : portage to Python

The TF architecture corresponds to the following features :

  • Tube & wing architecture with possibility to attach the wing on top of the fuselage

  • Twin or quad turbofan. In case of twin, possibility to attached engine on rear fuselage

  • Classical tail planes with the possibility to attach horizontal plane on top of the vertical tail

class marilib.airplane.propulsion.turbofan.turbofan_data.TurbofanEngine(reference_thrust=None, bpr=None, rating_factor=None, core_thrust_ratio=None, core_width_ratio=None, core_weight_ratio=None, kfn_off_take=None)[source]¶
